Title: Shut the Door. Have a Seat
Plot: Don has a big meeting with Connie about their future relationship. Betty is the beneficiary of some interesting advice and Pete has a serious sit-down with some clients.
GuestStars: Chelcie Ross, Charles Shaughnessy, Joseph Culp, Ryan Cartwright, Patrick Cavanaugh, J. Patrick McCormack, Alexa Alemanni, Brynn Horrocks
